thread.title: Ashley Madison coding blunder made over 11 million passwords easy to crack - PC World
thread.title_full: Ashley Madison coding blunder made over 11 million passwords easy to crack - PC World - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: PC World
title: Ashley Madison coding blunder made over 11 million passwords easy to crack - PC World
text:
Until today, the creators of the hacked AshleyMadison.com infidelity website appeared to have done at least one thing well: protect user passwords with a strong hashing algorithm. That belief, however, was painfully disproved by a group of hobbyist password crackers.
 PC World.
